NewsArticle.Title: Double Bonus Event
NewsArticle.Content: |---------------------------Double Bonus Event---------------------------| All registered accounts will receive DOUBLE Experience and Ability Points gained through monster kills, quest rewards, etc. Registered accounts will also receive DOUBLE the leveling rate of Skills and Spells. Itemshop Leveling Bonus will stack with this event!!! ((This event will begin on November 24th through November 28th. Register your accounts to take advantage of this special event!)) Happy Turkey Day, Dark Ages Team
